skill.summary: Integrate Vercel AI SDK for LLMs, Chatbots, Generative UI, and Agentic Workflows.
skill.author: AayushBaniya2006

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown files with code examples. No executable scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or environment variable reads detected. The skill teaches legitimate patterns for building AI features with Vercel AI SDK.

content.user_title: Build AI Chatbots and Generative UI
content.value_statement: Building AI features requires understanding streaming, structured data, and server components. This skill provides copy-paste ready patterns for implementing chat interfaces, JSON extraction, and dynamic UI generation with Vercel AI SDK.
actual_capabilities: Create streaming chat endpoints using streamText and useChat
Generate structured JSON objects from text with generateObject
Build server-side generative UI with streamUI components
Implement background agent workflows with Inngest integration
Handle multimodal chat with image attachments
Cache LLM responses for cost optimization
limitations: Requires existing Next.js App Router project
Needs API keys for OpenAI or Anthropic providers
Does not include pre-built UI components or styling

use_cases.title: AI-Powered Chat Interfaces
use_cases.description: Build real-time chat applications with streaming responses and message history management.

use_cases.title: Form Data Extraction
use_cases.description: Extract structured JSON data from user input for databases, forms, and documentation.

use_cases.title: Background AI Agents
use_cases.description: Create long-running AI agents that process tasks asynchronously without hitting server timeouts.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Chat Route
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a streaming chat API route at /api/chat using Vercel AI SDK streamText with OpenAI model. Include authentication protection.

prompt_templates.title: Generate JSON Data
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an API endpoint that uses generateObject to extract structured recipe data from a user prompt. Define the Zod schema for ingredients and steps.

prompt_templates.title: Generative UI Component
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a generative UI route that streams React components based on tool calls. Show a weather card example that renders when the model calls getWeather tool.

prompt_templates.title: Background Agent
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an Inngest function that runs a research agent with multiple steps. Use step.run to execute planning, execution, and synthesis stages with GPT-4o.

output_examples.input: Create a chat API route with streaming
output: Configure OpenAI model with apiKey from environment

best_practices: Always wrap AI routes with authentication to prevent unauthorized access
Use streaming for responses longer than 2 seconds to improve perceived latency
Limit agent loops with step IDs and maximum iterations to prevent runaway costs
anti_patterns: Exposing API routes without authentication checks
Storing API keys in client-side code or hardcoded values
Running agent workflows in standard API routes without timeouts handling

faq.question: Which AI models are supported?
faq.answer: OpenAI and Anthropic models are supported through @ai-sdk/openai and @ai-sdk/anthropic providers.

faq.question: What are the timeout limits?
faq.answer: Standard Next.js routes timeout around 60 seconds. Use Inngest for longer running agent workflows.

faq.question: How do I combine with authentication?
faq.answer: Wrap route handlers with withAuthRequired from auth-handler skill to protect endpoints.

faq.question: Is my data sent to external servers?
faq.answer: Yes, prompts and messages are sent to your configured LLM provider (OpenAI or Anthropic) for processing.

faq.question: Why is streaming not working?
faq.answer: Ensure you return result.toDataStreamResponse() and that the client uses useChat from @ai-sdk/react.

faq.question: How is this different from ai-handler?
faq.answer: ai-sdk-handler handles text, chat, and JSON workflows. Use ai-handler for image and video generation with Replicate.
